title: karainduruguvAi
sahitya:
karainduruguvAi manamE dinamE kaNNA kaNNA ena uruga nI


anupallavi

  maraindirundAlum manamirangi avan maDai tirandadu pOl karuNai pozhindiDa


caraNam    paNappEi vashappaTTu guNamadu kunrumun kaNam tanil maraindiDum iLamaiyum Eghumun
 taLar naDai vandumE tavittu nI vADumun vaLaroLi mAyOn padAmbujam nADik-
